definition: to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request
to seek/to look for/to request/to demand/to beseech
to sue for mercy/to ask for forgiveness/begging for magnanimity

sentences.english: I beg you overlook my rudeness.
sentences.chinese: 我请求你宽恕我的失礼。

sentences.english: So the widow one day entreated me to sing it to her thus.
sentences.chinese: 因此这位寡妇有一天请求我用这调子唱给她听。

sentences.english: Unsolicited advice is perceived as annoying. Don’t do it.
sentences.chinese: 未经请求的建议也会令人讨厌，所以不要那么做。

sentences.english: However, it's more polite than a direct request.
sentences.chinese: 但是，比起直接的询问，这是一种更为礼貌的请求。

sentences.english: It depends on which country you are planning to go.
sentences.chinese: 考哪种试是得依据外国粹校的请求的。

sentences.english: Begging is to request a donation in a supplicating manner.
sentences.chinese: 乞讨是以请求的方试去要求给予捐赠。

sentences.english: It is ungenerous of you to refuse his request.
sentences.chinese: 你拒绝他的请求，这样做并不大方。

sentences.english: Ask your student-loan servicer to extend your payback period.
sentences.chinese: 请求你的学生贷款商延长你的还款期限。

sentences.english: I want to reply to the person's request .
sentences.chinese: 我想要回复那人的请求。

sentences.english: But the request for “sayings” was not an unreasonable one.
sentences.chinese: 然而“惊世之语”并非不合理的请求。

sentences.english: Sends no request to the server.
sentences.chinese: 没有向服务器发送任何请求。

sentences.english: Dead link to send a request, the server returns a 404 error page.
sentences.chinese: 死链接发送请求时，服务器返回404错误页面。

sentences.english: Pray or ask for the long life of masters.
sentences.chinese: 祈愿或请求上师长寿住世。

sentences.english: The resource owner and requestor do not foreknow each other.
sentences.chinese: 资源的拥有者和请求者一般互相不知道。

definition: to fail to eventuate/(verb suffix) to be unsuccessful in ...ing
to answer/to respond/to answer positively/to agree/to accept/to promise
to answer/to reply/Reply to: (in email header)
variant of 答覆|答复[da2 fu4]
to request/to require/requirement/to stake a claim/to ask/to demand/CL:點|点[dian3]
